observation: I can see a signup page with a country/region selection dropdown that currently shows 'Select'. There are language selection modals open that I need to close first. I can see close buttons (×) in the top right corners of what appear to be language selection overlays.
reasoning: As a normal user trying to sign up, I need to close these language selection modals first before I can proceed with the country selection. I can see a close button (×) at element 31 which appears to be for closing one of the language modals.
ux_issues: Multiple language selection modals are blocking the main signup flow
Language modals don't seem to close properly with previous attempts

outcome.visual_observation: The sign-up flow progressed from showing cryptocurrency trading coins with 'Trade Gold, Crypto, Forex, Oil, and more.' to showing payment methods (STICPAY, Skrill) with a mobile app interface displaying 'Fast deposits, quick withdrawals.' The registration form on the right side remained consistent with the country/region dropdown and Next button.
